description: The wax begonia (Begonia semperflorens-cultorum 'Harmony Scarlet') is an amazing plant species with remarkable benefits. It's glossy, dark green leaves with red accents are stunning and make for vibrant plant displays. This evergreen variety is tolerant of a wide range of temperatures, and can even bloom continuously throughout the summer. Best of all, the wax begonia is an easy-care option that requires little maintenance! Water in moderation and plant in a bright, well-drained spot and you will be sure to enjoy the flowers' unique beauty over a long season.
